alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Echols; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, Camden, southern Glynn, southeastern Echols, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and central Charlton Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1221 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Country Club Estates to near Folkston to near Needmore. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Fernandina Beach, Hilliard, Folkston, Woodbine, Fargo and Dock Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Echols; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
